title: 99 LP feels bad
body: I know it has been like this for pretty much the whole time this game has been out but I have been earning 20 and above LP my whole plat 2 series and once it comes down to the final game, while not losing any of my other games, it bumps down to 18 LP and I get stuck at 99. Now I have to go through another game to maybe get 1 LP feelsbad, I know a lot of other people feel the same. I'm asking for 1 LP because if I lose this next game, I most likely will have to win 2 more games, knowing that I lose as much LP as I gain.

replies.body:
Oh man, that's so unlucky! I wanted to reassure you that Riot has not joined the illuminati and are not involved in a conspiracy to keep you from entering promotions. While I cannot grant you the 1 LP you're asking for, I believe that with hard work and focus, you'll enter your promotions without a hitch. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
